title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)), after
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Wild Salmon and Sea Trout
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Wild Salmon and Sea Trout 

Tagging Scheme (Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 1 January 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited wild salmon sea trout tagging scheme (amendment) regulation 2022 (2) regulation come operation 1 january 2023
